source:
spark.sql(f"""CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE crm_sanctioneddb.dim_opportunity
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://{fabric_workspace}@onelake.dfs.fabric.microsoft.com/crm_sanctioneddb.Lakehouse/Tables/dim_opportunity'
AS
SELECT
    COALESCE(source.Opportunity_id_nk, '0') AS Opportunity_id_nk,
    COALESCE(source.Opportunity_desc_nk, 'MISSING') AS Opportunity_desc_nk,
    COALESCE(source.Primary_Practice, 'MISSING') AS Primary_Practice,
    COALESCE(source.Business_Unit_Id_nk, 'MISSING') AS Business_Unit_Id_nk,
    COALESCE(source.Debrief_Id_nk, 'MISSING') AS Debrief_Id_nk,
    COALESCE(source.IQC_framework_id_nk, 'MISSING') AS IQC_framework_id_nk,
    COALESCE(source.Primary_Location_Country_Key, 'MISSING') AS Primary_Location_Country_Key,
    COALESCE(source.Account_Id_nk, 'MISSING') AS Account_Id_nk,
    COALESCE(source.Solicitation_type_id_nk, 0) AS Solicitation_type_id_nk,
    COALESCE(source.Proposal_Due_Date, CAST('1900-01-01' AS DATE)) AS Proposal_Due_Date,
    COALESCE(source.Estimated_value, 0.0) AS Estimated_value,
    COALESCE(source.Stage, 'MISSING') AS Stage,
    COALESCE(source.IQC_Award_Type, 'MISSING') AS IQC_Award_Type,
    COALESCE(source.IQC_Ceiling, 0.0) AS IQC_Ceiling,
    COALESCE(CAST(source.Pending_Win AS INT), 0) AS Pending_Win,
    COALESCE(source.Role, 'MISSING') AS Role,
    COALESCE(source.Comp_Range_Due_Date, CAST('1900-01-01' AS DATE)) AS Comp_Range_Due_Date,
    COALESCE(source.Probability_of_Bidding, 'MISSING') AS Probability_of_Bidding,
    COALESCE(source.Award_Date, CAST('1900-01-01' AS DATE)) AS Award_Date,
    COALESCE(source.Organization_Full_Name, 'MISSING') AS Organization_Full_Name,
    COALESCE(source.Contract_Type, 'MISSING') AS Contract_Type,
    COALESCE(source.Solicitation_Type, 'MISSING') AS Solicitation_Type,
    COALESCE(source.Solicitation_Short_Name, 'MISSING') AS Solicitation_Short_Name,
    COALESCE(source.Solicitation_Full_Name, 'MISSING') AS Solicitation_Full_Name,
    COALESCE(source.Anticipated_Sol_Type, 'MISSING') AS Anticipated_Sol_Type,
    COALESCE(source.Solicitation_Release_Date, CAST('1900-01-01' AS DATE)) AS Solicitation_Release_Date,
    COALESCE(source.CRM_URL, 'MISSING') AS CRM_URL,
    COALESCE(source.Audit_Hash_Cd, hash('MISSING')) AS Audit_Hash_Cd,
    COALESCE(source.IsActive, 1) AS IsActive,
    COALESCE(source.effective_start_date, CAST('2020-01-01' AS DATE)) AS effective_start_date,
    COALESCE(source.effective_end_date, CAST('9999-12-31' AS DATE)) AS effective_end_date,
    current_date() AS Date_Created,
    current_date() AS Date_Updated_Last,
    current_user() AS Created_By,
    current_user() AS Updated_By
FROM (
    SELECT DISTINCT
        O.opportunityid AS Opportunity_id_nk,
        '' AS Opportunity_desc_nk,
        O.new_technocalsectorsname AS Primary_Practice,
        O.new_chemonicsrbuentity AS Business_Unit_Id_nk,
        O.new_debrief AS Debrief_Id_nk,
        O.new_parentiqc AS IQC_framework_id_nk,
        O.new_primarycountry AS Primary_Location_Country_Key,
        O.chem_missionorganizationissuingcontract AS Account_Id_nk,
        O.new_anticipatedsoltype AS Solicitation_type_id_nk,
        O.new_proposalduedate AS Proposal_Due_Date,
        COALESCE(O.estimatedvalue_base, 0.0) AS Estimated_value,
        OM_new_stage.LocalizedLabel AS Stage,
        O.chem_iqcawardtype AS IQC_Award_Type,
        COALESCE(O.new_iqcceilingcurrency_base, 0.0) AS IQC_Ceiling,
        O.chem_pendingwin AS Pending_Win,
        O.new_role1 AS Role,
        O.new_comprangeduedate AS Comp_Range_Due_Date,
        OM_new_determinecertaintyofsoliciationrelease1.LocalizedLabel AS Probability_of_Bidding,
        O.finaldecisiondate AS Award_Date,
        A.name AS Organization_Full_Name,
        GOM_new_contracttype.LocalizedLabel AS Contract_Type,
        OM_new_solicitationtype.LocalizedLabel AS Solicitation_Type,
        O.new_solicitationlongname AS Solicitation_Short_Name,
        O.name AS Solicitation_Full_Name,
        O.new_anticipatedsoltype AS Anticipated_Sol_Type,
        O.new_releasedate AS Solicitation_Release_Date,
        CONCAT('https://chemonics.crm.dynamics.com/main.aspx?appid=6a416dab-0787-e811-a95c-000d3a3af855&pagetype=entityrecord&etn=opportunity&id=', O.opportunityid) AS CRM_URL,
        HASH(
            O.opportunityid, O.new_technocalsectorsname, O.new_chemonicsrbuentity, O.new_debrief, O.new_parentiqc, O.new_primarycountry, O.chem_missionorganizationissuingcontract, O.new_anticipatedsoltype, O.new_proposalduedate, O.estimatedvalue_base,
            OM_new_stage.LocalizedLabel,
            O.chem_iqcawardtype, O.new_iqcceilingcurrency_base, O.chem_pendingwin, O.new_role1, O.new_comprangeduedate,
            OM_new_determinecertaintyofsoliciationrelease1.LocalizedLabel,
            O.finaldecisiondate, A.name,
            GOM_new_contracttype.LocalizedLabel,
            OM_new_solicitationtype.LocalizedLabel,
            O.new_solicitationlongname, O.name, O.new_anticipatedsoltype, O.new_releasedate
        ) AS Audit_Hash_Cd,
        O.IsActive,
        CAST('2020-01-01' AS DATE) AS effective_start_date,
        CAST('9999-12-31' AS DATE) AS effective_end_date,
        current_date() AS Date_Created,
        current_date() AS Date_Updated_Last,
        current_user() AS Created_By,
        current_user() AS Updated_By
    FROM crm_query.opportunity O
    LEFT JOIN crm_query.account A ON A.accountid = O.new_prime
    LEFT JOIN (
        SELECT Option, LocalizedLabel
        FROM {source_container}.OptionsetMetadata
        WHERE EntityName = 'opportunity' AND OptionSetName = 'new_stage'
    ) OM_new_stage ON O.new_stage = OM_new_stage.Option
    LEFT JOIN (
        SELECT Option, LocalizedLabel
        FROM {source_container}.OptionsetMetadata
        WHERE EntityName = 'opportunity' AND OptionSetName = 'new_determinecertaintyofsoliciationrelease1'
    ) OM_new_determinecertaintyofsoliciationrelease1 ON O.new_determinecertaintyofsoliciationrelease1 = OM_new_determinecertaintyofsoliciationrelease1.Option
    LEFT JOIN (
        SELECT Option, LocalizedLabel
        FROM {source_container}.OptionsetMetadata
        WHERE EntityName = 'opportunity' AND OptionSetName = 'new_solicitationtype'
    ) OM_new_solicitationtype ON O.new_solicitationtype = OM_new_solicitationtype.Option
    LEFT JOIN (
        SELECT Option, LocalizedLabel
        FROM {source_container}.GlobalOptionsetMetadata
        WHERE EntityName = 'opportunity' AND OptionSetName = 'new_contracttype'
    ) GOM_new_contracttype ON O.new_contracttype = GOM_new_contracttype.Option
    WHERE O.IsActive = 1 AND A.IsActive = 1
) AS source;
""")
